tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genomic_variation_data (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  nucleotide_change VARCHAR(10),
  genotype VARCHAR(5),
  allele_frequency FLOAT,
  disease_risk_prediction FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SampleTable1 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_id INT,
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT,
    allele VARCHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE SampleTable2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    variant_id INT,
    genotype VARCHAR(3),
    quality_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Genomic_Variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  chrom VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  ref VARCHAR(10),
  alt VARCHAR(10),
  impact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Disease_Predictions (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_id INT,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  prediction FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (variation_id) REFERENCES Genomic_Variations(variation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Machine_Learning_Models (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  algorithm VARCHAR(50),
  accuracy FLOAT,
  trained_on TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GenomicVariationData (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  VariationType VARCHAR(50),
  VariantDescription TEXT,
  ChromosomeNumber INT,
  Position INT,
  GeneSymbol VARCHAR(50),
  DiseaseAssociated Boolean
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseRiskPrediction (
  PatientID INT,
  RiskScore FLOAT,
  PredictionDate DATE,
  ModelUsed VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (PatientID, PredictionDate)
);

CREATE TABLE Genes (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    gene_location VARCHAR(100),
    gene_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Variants (
    variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    variant_name VARCHAR(255),
    variant_type VARCHAR(50),
    variant_frequency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Individuals (
    individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_id INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
    disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    disease_type VARCHAR(50),
    risk_factor FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Predictions (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    individual_id INT,
    disease_id INT,
    prediction_score FLOAT,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(10)
)
